name: Europena 'A' Teams Multiple Choice Quiz | Europe | 15 Questions

questions.text: In which country does Anderlecht play?
questions.explanation:
Belgium.

	Anderlecht are Belgium's most successful club, and come from Brussels.

Italy.

	Atalanta are based in the city of Bergamo, in northern Italy.

Scotland.

	Airdrieonians come from Airdrie, a town on the outskirts of Glasgow.

France.

	The town of Auxerre is just south of Paris.

questions.text: Alaves is a club which plays in which country?
questions.explanation:
Spain.

	Alaves, the small club from Vitoria in northern Spain, became famous when they played Liverpool in the 2001 UEFA Cup Final.

questions.text: AIK Solna come from which country?
questions.explanation:
Sweden.

	AIK Solna are better known as AIK Stockholm.

questions.text: What country does the team Angers play in?
questions.explanation:
France.

	Angers is a town west of Paris.

questions.text: AA Gent come from which country?
AZ Alkmaar lost to Ipswich Town in the 1981 UEFA Cup Final. What country are they from?
Aarhus GF come from which country?
The team Ararat Yerevan plays in which country?
Amica Wronki come from which country?
